website_summaries.verdict: Good construction quality in a harness that has a bit of padding for extra long climbing sessions.
pros: Contains a bit of padding around the waist for comfort
Includes a ring for attaching tools and equipment
Breathable materials make it more comfortable to wear in hot weather
cons: Priced a little higher than some others

customer_reviews.title: Great qualityTree climbing belt when combined with a good vertical climbing belt .
customer_reviews.text: Used these to help safely climb a 40' antenna tower to install a new antenna . Combined with the Tree Spider Vertical Climbing Belt I was able to safely climb the tower and then work hands free . I have a 38" waist and weigh 225 pounds. This tree climbing belt has plenty of room to expand as well as fit smaller persons . It appears to be well made compared to the more expensive ones I looked at . Good value .
customer_reviews.author: Keith Root

customer_reviews.title: At the end of day I could not trust it my life with it
customer_reviews.text: I received this item, and the stitching looked suspect. I read several reviews that said the same thing, but that it was still OK after using it, I used it three or four times the it looked even worse, so I decided it was not worth the risk to continue using this product. I decided to purchase another harness on amazon that was cheaper, but it turned out to have better stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Light Heart

customer_reviews.title: Belt & attachments were less large and strong than he was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: Husband felt it was a "good start", but chose to add stronger spring link catches to the belt. He'd rather use clips rated for heavier use than to have tools held with weaker clips. He also found it a bit small and would have liked a larger belt with room for adjustment factored in. Less comfortable than he'd hoped for, but then again, having to cut a tree with a girth larger than his was never going to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowRavenFair

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been up in several trees as a novice arborist and these have been a good purchase. They feel safe, and since I'm not a professional looking for the absolute best, I was very happy with the price compared to many alternatives. The adjustability of all the different straps allows them to be fairly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Stitching good
customer_reviews.text: This harness is VERY heavy and fairly heavy duty. The metal clips are very thick. HOWEVER, not every clip is metal as described in the product description, there are plastic strap adjusters on it (see photo). The stitching is good and I feel very safe climbing in it.
customer_reviews.author: LawyerMom

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty sturdy little harness
customer_reviews.text: I realize I was putting my life in the hands of a $60 saddle, 150' up in the air.. Felt totally safe, but makes me think back now while I'm wearing my $500 saddle. It's a pretty sturdy little harness, though. Just make sure to inspect each climb.
customer_reviews.author: Angus Barnhart-Usedom

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Made climbing any size tree very safe
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Made climbing any size tree very safe. Fit very well also. I felt very secure while climbing and trimming trees of any size.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Renzelman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great deal, got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Kept my husband secure and comfortable while he was 20+ feet up in the air, chopping a dead limb of a tree, allowed him to be secure but still have all the freedom of movement he needed. Was perfect for our needs, and didn't need to pay the price of a "professional" one.
customer_reviews.author: FuhrFamily

customer_reviews.title: Slips down too easily
customer_reviews.text: Sturdily made, but probably should have built in suspenders. Although I adjusted it pretty snug, it slipped down past my waist while I was climbing. I had to stop twice, mid climb, to pull the harness up. It's a safety issue. Granted, I managed to make the harness work, but it should have suspenders or some other method to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCIS X HOFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: this rig is great.
customer_reviews.text: For one that only uses it occasionally, this rig is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty harness. Fast abippping.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing seat. I use his harness for everything. I need to say that all I buy is Petzl. That's it. But this is a robust piece of equipment that I'm proud to have in my Arsenal. One of my favorites for tree climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Kouri

customer_reviews.title: Solid and extremely functional!
customer_reviews.text: Using this harness to climb trees for deer hunting. The harness is crafted very well and I am not worried in the slightest that it will fail as I'm 35 feet up in a tree. Not the lightest harness that's available but if weight isn't a factor for you I would say go for it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: hangin from a tree!
customer_reviews.text: Feels little bit heavy. If you never worn professional harness you will be OK with it because it is 6 times cheaper. I personally would like to have a replaceable rope bridge instead of webbing but again - it is cheap and it works.
customer_reviews.author: BACbKA nynKuH

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness for nice price
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this seems like a fine harness to him. He had me include a picture of the bag that it was in should that information be relevant to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarie

customer_reviews.title: solid value for money. This isn't a 400$ saddle ...
customer_reviews.text: solid value for money. This isn't a 400$ saddle. but can used for professional tree work. it is legit for what it is. I've got 11 years experience in tree work.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Olsen

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the harness - I have used it a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the harness - I have used it a dozen times now and have sorted out the most comfortable position for the leg straps. Good value. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Myron D.

customer_reviews.title: Too comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's too comfortable. My guys don't feel safe since no matter how tight they make it, it still doesn't feel uncomfortable. It is nice to be able to sit in the trees and relax through...
customer_reviews.author: Eddie G.

customer_reviews.title: Not for certified working conditions
customer_reviews.text: Not ansi or osha certified. Will not used for working purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Nuggets

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I needed to redo the leg straps not put together properly
customer_reviews.author: Mark Van Sledright

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it it's his favorite saddle and he professionally did this for 18 years ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it it's his favorite saddle and he professionally did this for 18 years now he's just doing it on the side and he loves it by far we are very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing harness for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing harness for the price!! Very strong and durable. Might be buying another one for a back up. Used it for two trees so far. Only thing I don't like is that the pieces where you hook your equipment aren't protected but other then that its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this saddle is actually very comfortable, i actually modified mine with 2 new petzle ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a arborist, this saddle is actually very comfortable, i actually modified mine with 2 new petzle open rings and a custom rope bridge. I cut the old ring off. Side note there is no markings on saddle indicating if its osha approved. Same thing with the rings they dont have ratings on them. Other than that the saddle is super lightweight and it rocks actually like it more than my buckingham ergovation
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy this.....
customer_reviews.text: Be warned the picture shows the bridge positioned at the waist but it actually is about hip level. The picture is a semi seated position. It doesn't come with instructions either which makes me nervous (come on china, too cheap to print instructions now?!?) and Not ansi/ osha rated. This will not fit over carhart pants easily other than that this is a good buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Uraniumangel235

customer_reviews.title: Good for the occasional climber
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace the 30+ year old saddle I had been using. I am 6' tall and weigh 215 lbs. it fits well, is comfortable to sit in, and adjusts fairly easily, It does not have any ANSI or NFPA certifications so your use in a regulated setting may be prohibited. But for my few times a year ascent into the trees on my property it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Ump107

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality been using for tree trimming Very comfortable even with chainsaw chaps on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this set with climbing spikes to climb and top trees
customer_reviews.text: May be a bit difficult for a novice to put on but has many attachment rings and loops for whatever you're using it to climb including two very thick aluminum rings I like. I way 250 pounds and it holds me fine. If you're inexperienced in using climbing gear one suggestion I could make to male users is to wear something with a little extra crotch room as these can be quite constricting with jeans and once you're 40 feet up a tree there's no way to "readjust".
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Henderson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps twisting every time you go to put it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps twisting every time you go to put it on takes 15 to 20min just to get it on gets to be a pain
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Feel perfectly safe in harness but getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Feel perfectly safe in harness but getting it on and off is a bit tricky and it can twist easily when stored. If it was a quick on off, it would have gotten 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Montgomery Burns

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the way it fits not what not happy ...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the way it fits not what not happy with the way it hooks up pools on your legs and I kind of think I waste my money on it SNAP balance pools in the wrong places
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: But it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality harness looks much better in person than the picture practically a petzl sequoia Harness for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Logan R.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so far and it works fine. I need to make some more adjustments for a better fit. Makes my wife a lot more comfortable when I was wearing it. I'll be using it again this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: George Clark

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HARNESS
customer_reviews.text: This harness was even bigger and better than I had imagined. VEEEEEERY NICE. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow was very surprised at this saddle omg comfortable and lite weight very easy to adjust to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow was very surprised at this saddle omg comfortable and lite weight very easy to adjust to fit me at 6 ft tall and 260 lbs great price also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, adjustable for good fit, comfortable, inexpensive, good product
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: I have moved from an old style bosun saddle and find this much more comfortable. The only minor issue I have is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality climbing saddle. I have moved from an old style bosun saddle and find this much more comfortable. The only minor issue I have is that the thigh strap height adjustments slip. I have had to stitch the adjustment to a fixed position. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Albert TenBruggencate

customer_reviews.title: very uncomfortable don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not secure for tree climbing,very uncomfortable don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Belt is well made and a good value for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: It would get 5 stars if it had a center located D-ring. There are two rings at the front on each side. This is fine provided your lanyard will go around the tie off structure with one hook per ring on each side of the belt. Hanging on these side rings feels comfortable and secure. If a single D-ring was located at center rear or front, this would allow for a single connection for the harness. But to get the suspended load (you) hanging in balance, you need to tie off to both rings on the belt. Belt is well made and a good value for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: To fat to fit
customer_reviews.text: This product is for skinny people not fat asses like myself
customer_reviews.author: Mike V Fantanarosa

product_meta.title: YXGOOD Treestand Harness, Tree Working Safety Belt, Climbing Harness for Garden Art Clip, Tree Clip, Firefighting On Tree
feature_bullets: Waist Strap: 85-120 cm (33.46-47.24 inch), Leg Strap: 60-75 cm (23.62-29.53 inch), The Maximum Load : 150 kg (330 pound).

At fixed working position, the strong waist will bear the especially widen and thicken waist pad. The pad of waist strap and leg strap are made from breathable foam so the rescuer can feel more comfortable.

Be able to use in union with abdominal ascender fixing belt（RC74). And its capacity expansion is climbing safety belt. Leg strap made from width varied webbing that is convenient for operator to climb by pedal-ascender (RB02) rope.
Equipped with 5 tool ring, which make it so easy to carry more repair tool. It is a excellent tool for people who work in garden art clip, tree clip, and firefighting on tree.
Great for use in Construction, Demolition, Climbing, Welding, Roofing, Camping, Emergency, Firefighting On Tree and other outdoor activity.
